name: An ornate whitewood staff (2h)
data: It has average weapon class for its type (feeble in general).
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It increases the users charisma poorly.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'mastery of shielding'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'greater vulnerability'.
